pr_title: [CALCITE-3855] Supports snapshot on table with virtual columns during…

timeline.message:
[CALCITE-3855] Supports snapshot on table with virtual columns during sql-to-rel conversion

In SqlToRelConverter#convertTemporalTable, we actually should not assume
that the rel to snapshot is always a TableScan.

timeline.author: DonnyZone
